name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.18.0-5e4757e701492dbae8fe685f50e95aa8414f6d67 "index template [winning_v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [winning_v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
